amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for FAA Operations by $3 million and increase funding for Federal Railroad Administration Safety and Operations by a similar amount in order to address funding of rail safety education programs, such as Operation Lifesaver.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for FAA Operations by $3 million and increase funding for Federal Railroad Administration Safety and Operations by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Esty amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 230 (Roll no. 308).
